tweet: We’ve joined @MessariCrypto for #Cardano to be listed in their #open-source disclosures registry to increase transparency. More details and formal announcement to follow once the listing is live. Transparency will lead to a smarter decision-making and more maturity to blockchain.

JUST IN: 10 projects – including @Cardano, @LiskHQ and @beamprivacy – joined the @MessariCrypto Disclosures Registry on Tuesday in a bid to foster transparency.   @BradyDale reports  https://t.co/W448c5FdXV

Cardano Foundation, as one of its sponsors, is attending the #wyoHackathon event next month. Hackathons are a great way for us to share #Plutus and #Marlowe to the wider community. Join the experts from #IOHK in Wyoming! Learn more here:  https://t.co/L63QXS7c8N #Cardano

#Shelley will introduce staking to #ADA for the first time via its Ouroboros Genesis consensus mechanism. The concept seems promising, but in the end, it all boils down to execution. We'll soon  see if #Cardano has what it takes to achieve decentralization.  #crypto #altcoins
Smart contracts written on the #Cardano Blockchain will be different and more powerful. Learn why in this latest #EMURGO blog.  https://t.co/3TD2JxrFt8
